participant_1.background:
I enjoy spending my free time outdoors, either riding my bike or playing with my dogs.
my favorite food is anything italian.
My most exotic travel experience was when I went to Thailand and saw the floating markets.
i work at a restaurant as waiter.
i have 5 children.

participant_2.background:
I'm secretly worried that my grocery store won't be successful.
I'm going to spend time with my family and friends.
i live in a suburb of boston.
I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion.
i love to go to the lake.

content.text: Greetings! What are your plans for the weekend?
I'm going to spend time with my family and friends at the lake.
Sounds like a relaxing time! Do you have any hobbies?
I love archery and go to the range often! What about you?
I enjoy riding my bike and playing with my dogs. I also love Italian food, my favorite travel experience was when I went to Thailand and saw the floating markets.
That's amazing! I've never been to Thailand but I've heard great things about it. I have a lot of family in Boston, so I go there often.
I'm not surprised, Boston is a beautiful city. Do you have any other plans for the weekend?
Not really, I'm just going to enjoy the company of my family and friends. How about you?
I'm going to spend some time at the park with my kids. I'm also working on a new recipe for lasagna, I'm hoping to try it out this weekend.
That sounds delicious! I love lasagna, I'll have to try your recipe.
I'm sure you'll love it! I've been making it for years and I've perfected the recipe.
